definition[0]: the size or importance of something
example[0]: Try to reduce your tasks to more manageable proportions.
example[1]: an ecological tragedy of enormous proportions
example[2]: For most of us, Scott was a hero of mythic proportions.
example[3]: The flu outbreak has reached epidemic proportions.
definition[1]: the relative sizes of the different parts of a building, object etc
example[5]: the elegant proportions of the living room
